event.title: Ada & Zangemann reading at Rollhofschule primary school in Schw√§bisch-Hall, Germany

body.p: On 6 February, Matthias Kirschner will read the book 'Ada & Zangemann - A tale of software, skateboards, and raspberry ice cream' to two third classes at the Rollhofschule. Afterwards there will be discussions with the pupils about software, hardware, tinkering, and of course their favourite ice cream.
